founders.name: Farah Dadabhoy, MD, MS
founders.bio: Farah Dadabhoy is a Clinical Instructor at Harvard Medical School and a Pain Medicine Fellow at Brigham and Women’s Hospital.

founders.name: Adaira Landry, MD MEd
founders.bio: Adaira Landry is an Assistant Professor at Harvard Medical School and an Emergency Medicine Physician at Brigham and Women’s Hospital.
